p: PLX‐PAD were aseptically filled in cryogenic bags at a concentration of 10–20 × 10 6 PLX cells/mL in a mixture containing 10% dimethyl sulfoxide, 5% human albumin, and plasmalyte and stored in gas phase liquid nitrogen at a temperature lower than −150 °C. The required amount of PLX‐PAD (1 bag) was thawed in a heated water bath (37 °C) immediately prior injection.
